textAfterTable: Rental Period Rental Price Approximate Day Rate 3 days $665.00 $221.67 4 days $713.00 $178.25 7 days $950.00 $135.71 10 days $1283.00 $128.30 14 days $1663.00 $118.79 21 days $2233.00 $106.33 30 days $2803.00 $93.43 45 days $3658.00 $81.29 60 days $4275.00 $71.25 90 days $5510.00 $61.22 LensRentals.com ships via the appropriate FedEx service necessary to have your rental arrive on the date selected. Return shipping is included in the shipping price, and we include a prepaid return label with your order - all you need to do is bring it to a FedEx drop-off location when your rental is complete. If you prefer UPS shipping, you can select it during the checkout process for about 10% more.
